properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -f " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /f ") and (FolderPath endswith "\\odbcconf.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "odbcconf.exe") and ProcessCommandLine contains ".rsp"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of "odbcconf" with the "-f" flag in order to load a response file which might contain a malicious action.
